node.name: chelenge
node.rich_text:
mai ano chelenge solve karva ni try kari an mai
1st payload run karyo je simple chhe je mane hackthebox ma aplo hoi chhe
php://filter/read=convert.base64-encode/resource=[filename]

aa url no akho matlb mane samjano ke aa payload kare chhe su
pela apde to check karyu ke php ma webapp baneli che ane ena pachi apde tene command lakhyo jemke
php://filter/read=convert.base64-encode/resource=[ahiya jete file lagu padti hoi te avse ane te ni apde php file banaviye che ane command execute kariye chhe jya filter no matlb mane nathi khabar pn read no matlabke read karvu =â‡’ jete file apde lagu padti hoi te matalb

] ena pachi apde payload try karvani
http;//x.x.x.x//index.php?object=php://filter/read=convert.base64-encode/resource=[jetefile] ama dhyan rakhvu jete file mai eej file avi jove je server ma running chhe exxits kare chhe apde teni ek cpy php ma banavine check kariye chiye ke su lfi ahiya kaam kare chee ke nahi bass hu aje thaki gayo ajee hu atluj kari sakyo
